titles: Of resisting the lavvfull magistrate under colour of religion and appendant to it, of the word keima, rendred damnation, Rom. 13, reprinted : also, [brace] of zelots among the Jewes, of taking up the crosse, a vindication of Christs reprehending St. Peter, from the exceptions of Mr. Marshall.
author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.
Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.
notes: Attributed to Hammond by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Government, Resistance to --  Religious aspects --  Christianity.
